content: small doily #13 1 small doily #13 pattern by papushoipatterns materials - cotton thread corresponding hook i hope you enjoy these patterns if you find any errors or typos please let me know pollinka911@gmail com you can find other patterns here https //www ravelry com/designers/polina- papushoi you can buy me a coffee skein of thread here h ttps //www buymeacoffee com/ papushoi copyright 2023 papushoipatterns all rights reserved small doily #13 2 abbreviations us terms and notes chain chain st stitch slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet fp- complete stitch around the post from front to back bp- complete stitch around the post from back to front decrease 2 or more indicated stitches joined together at the top popcorn complete the number of stitches into the stitch or space indicated drop the loop from the hook place the hook in the first stitch of the popcorn set grab the dropped loop and pull it through cluster 2 or more indicated stitches worked into the same stitch or space and joined together at the top picot chain 3 slip_stitch in 3rd chain from the hook each round ends with slip_stitch in the 1st st of the round *_* = repeat around crochet stitches tutorial video https //youtu be/lvief5ialws pattern 0 chain 6 join to form a circle 1 chain 2 double_crochet in the circle counts as first 2dc-cluster chain 3 2dc-cluster in the circle chain 3 5 times join 6 2dc-clusters 6 ch3-spaces 2 chain 3 counts as first double_crochet here and throughout chain 2 double_crochet in next space chain 2 *double_crochet in next 2dc-cluster chain 2 double_crochet in next space chain 2* around join 12 double_crochet 12 ch2-spaces 3 fp-slip_stitch around first double_crochet chain 3 counts as first fp-double_crochet 2 double_crochet in next space chain 2 fp-4dc-popcorn around next double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in next space *fp-double_crochet around next double_crochet 2 double_crochet in next space chain 2 fp-4dc-popcorn around next double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in next space* around join 6 fp-double_crochet 24 double_crochet 12 ch2-spaces 6 4dc-popcorns copyright 2023 papushoipatterns all rights reserved small doily #13 3 4 chain 3 4 double_crochet in first fp-double_crochet skip 1 double_crochet single_crochet in next double_crochet single_crochet in next space chain 2 single_crochet in next space single_crochet in next double_crochet skip 1 double_crochet *5 double_crochet in next fp-double_crochet skip 1 double_crochet single_crochet in next double_crochet single_crochet in next space chain 2 single_crochet in next space single_crochet in next double_crochet skip 1 double_crochet* around join 30 double_crochet 24 single_crochet 6 ch2-spaces 5 fp-slip_stitch around first double_crochet chain 2 fp-double_crochet around same double_crochet counts as first fp- 2dc-cluster chain 1 fp-2dc-cluster around next double_crochet 4 times skip 2 single_crochet single_crochet in next space skip 2 single_crochet *fp-2dc-cluster around next double_crochet chain 1 fp- 2dc-cluster around next double_crochet 4 times skip 2 single_crochet single_crochet in next space skip 2 single_crochet* around join 30 fp-2dc-clusters 24 ch1-spaces 6 single_crochet 6 chain 3 chain 1 4dc-popcorn in next space chain 1 double_crochet in next fp-2dc-cluster 4 times
